tool_description: priceline.com | Lets you search hotels, cars for rent, flights. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel  api:** https://rapi.one
name: Priceline com Provider
title: Priceline com Provider

api_list.name: Auto Suggest
api_list.description: This API will provide a list of possible cities and hotels for a given search string

required_parameters.name: string
required_parameters.description: Search string that will enable a list of selection to be listed to the traveller.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Enum: rank, name. Method of sorting the results. Valid options: rank, name

optional_parameters.name: get_airports
optional_parameters.description: Include airports in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Method of ordering the results of the search. Valid options: asc or desc.

optional_parameters.name: combine_regions
optional_parameters.description: Enables the spell check option for the search string using either true or false.

optional_parameters.name: get_pois
optional_parameters.description: Include Points of Interest in search results. Valid Options: True or False

optional_parameters.name: get_regions
optional_parameters.description: Include Regions in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

optional_parameters.name: get_cities
optional_parameters.description: Include cities in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

optional_parameters.name: show_all_cities
optional_parameters.description: Will filter out cities with no hotels. Valid Options: False = filter out cities without hotels, True = show cities with and without hotels.

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Number passed is the maximum number of results returned.

optional_parameters.name: get_hotels
optional_parameters.description: Include hotels in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

optional_parameters.name: spellcheck
optional_parameters.description: Enables the spell check option for the search string using either true or false.

api_list.name: Search (results v)
api_list.description: The getResultsRequest endpoint returns car availability based on the provided search criteria

required_parameters.name: dropoff_date
required_parameters.description: Car Drop Off Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY).

required_parameters.name: pickup_date
required_parameters.description: Car Pick Up Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_lat_long
optional_parameters.description: dropoff location by latitude and longitude. Accepts a comma separated latitude and longitude values.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_code
optional_parameters.description: Accepts a 3-character IATA airport code or a single PPN City ID.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_counters
optional_parameters.description: Accepts an array of one or more keys as a 2-character car company code and the values as the counter location code.

optional_parameters.name: prepaid_rates
optional_parameters.description: If activated, set the value as prepaid_rates=1 to display prepaid rates

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_code
optional_parameters.description: Accepts a 3-character IATA airport code or a single PPN City ID.

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_counters
optional_parameters.description: Accepts an array of one or more keys as a 2-character car company code and the values as the counter ocation code.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_lat_long
optional_parameters.description: Pickup location by latitude and longitude. Accepts a comma separated latitude and longitude values.

api_list.name: Search hotels locations by geolocation
api_list.description: Search locations by coordinates. Set coordinates latitude and longitude

api_list.name: Search - express results
api_list.description: Provides discounted Express (Cached) and Closed User Group (Live) Rates using the getExpress.Results endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: airport_code
optional_parameters.description: Accepts a 3-character IATA airport code.

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: The total number of adult occupants for all rooms requested. Used with children parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, adults=2 and children=2

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: Sort results by a given option. Default sort is by guest_score. Valid Options: gs = guest_score, sr = star_rating, lp = lowest_price, hp = highest_price, ds = distance, mp = most_popular.

optional_parameters.name: multiple_deals
optional_parameters.description: Multi Rates are provided Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true.

optional_parameters.name: rate_limit
optional_parameters.description: Number passed to limit the number of rates returned. Defaults to returning all available rates

optional_parameters.name: limit_to_country
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to country provided. Valid Options: true or false.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: Search for property availability around a specific longitude coordinate

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: Search for property availability around a specific latitude coordinate.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of results from the response.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_ids
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated string of PPN hotel ids (Semi Opaque Only)

optional_parameters.name: city_id
optional_parameters.description: Accepts a single PPN City ID.)

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language code: en-US, es-ES, fr-FR, pt-BR

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description: The total number of child occupants for all rooms requested. Used with adults parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, adults=2 and children=2

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Pass the user s country to see rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.

optional_parameters.name: output_version
optional_parameters.description: Enum: 1 2 3 4

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Radius in miles the results are from

optional_parameters.name: sid
optional_parameters.description: Session ID. Random string

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants

optional_parameters.name: rate_identifier
optional_parameters.description: A toggle to show if rate identifier is being passed. Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true. Rate is a string that is set for each hotel and holds all the information regarding the rate that we send to priceline.

api_list.name: Hotel details
api_list.description: Provides information on the specified hotel

required_parameters.name: hotel_id
required_parameters.description: The PPN Hotel ID identifying the desired property.

optional_parameters.name: airport_limit
optional_parameters.description: airport_limit

optional_parameters.name: check_in
optional_parameters.description: Check In Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

optional_parameters.name: promo
optional_parameters.description: Toggle the hotels promo data on and off. By default, promo data is excluded in the response. To include promo data in the response, set promo to 1.

optional_parameters.name: photos
optional_parameters.description: Toggles photo data. By default, hotel photo data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

optional_parameters.name: videos
optional_parameters.description: Toggle videos. Valid Options: True or False

optional_parameters.name: guest_score_breakdown
optional_parameters.description: Toggle guest score breakdown on and off. Valid Options: True or False

optional_parameters.name: reviews
optional_parameters.description: Toggle hotel review data. By default, review data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = On.

optional_parameters.name: city_limit
optional_parameters.description: city_limit

optional_parameters.name: sid
optional_parameters.description: Session ID. Random string

optional_parameters.name: important_info
optional_parameters.description: Toggles important info. Important info is extra details regarding the specified hotel. By default, important info is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

optional_parameters.name: recent
optional_parameters.description: Toggle recent sales. Valid Options: True, False

optional_parameters.name: poi_limit
optional_parameters.description: poi_limit

optional_parameters.name: plugins
optional_parameters.description: Provides extra information regarding plugins for the specified hotel. To include specific plugin information, include the ID of the plugin as a comma separated value to the plugins parameter.

optional_parameters.name: image_size
optional_parameters.description: The size of the image returned. Valid Options: small (60px), medium(300 to 312px) or large(500 to 800px)

optional_parameters.name: id_lookup
optional_parameters.description: Allows non-PPN Hotel IDs to be searched in the database. Valid Options: True or False

optional_parameters.name: check_out
optional_parameters.description: Check In Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

optional_parameters.name: nearby
optional_parameters.description: Toggles nearby data. Nearby data is extra information regarding the specified hotel s location. Nearby data can include city_data, airport_data, and poi_category_data. By default, nearby data is excluded from the response. To include nearby data, set nearby to 1. To include city_data within nearby data, include a city_limit parameter to a value greater than 1. To include airport_data within nearby data, include a airport_limit parameter to a value greater than 1. To include poi_category_data within nearby data, include a poi_limit parameter to a value greater than 1.

required_parameters.name: location_pickup

api_list.name: Search flights
api_list.description: Search flights. Set type: `ONE_WAY` or `ROUND_TRIP`. Set location_departure and location_arrival, use `/flights/locations` api point. You can filter out tickets by price, max duration and number of stops

required_parameters.name: location_departure
required_parameters.description: Departure location code. Use `Search locations` api point

optional_parameters.name: price_max
optional_parameters.description: Price max

optional_parameters.name: price_min
optional_parameters.description: Price min

optional_parameters.name: number_of_stops
optional_parameters.description: Number of stops. 0 - is direct flight

optional_parameters.name: date_departure_return
optional_parameters.description: Departure date back

optional_parameters.name: number_of_passengers
optional_parameters.description: Number of passengers

optional_parameters.name: duration_max
optional_parameters.description: Duration max. Minutes

optional_parameters.name: results_per_page
optional_parameters.description: Number of results per page. Used in conjunction with page.

api_list.name: Search (results request)
api_list.description: The getResultsRequest endpoint returns car availability based on the provided search criteria

required_parameters.name: pickup_date
required_parameters.description: Car Pick Up Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

required_parameters.name: dropoff_date
required_parameters.description: Car Drop Off Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY).

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_lat_long
optional_parameters.description: Pickup location by latitude and longitude. Accepts a comma separated latitude and longitude values.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_city_string
optional_parameters.description: Pickup city name.

optional_parameters.name: result_offset
optional_parameters.description: Used with limit to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the number of properties to skip (starting at 0) before returning results.

optional_parameters.name: strict_city
optional_parameters.description: Filter strictly by city ID (pickup_city_id or dropoff_city_id). Pass strict_city=true or strict_city=1 to enable.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_city_id
optional_parameters.description: Pickup city ID. Or filters by pickup_city_id when strict_city=1 is passed.

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_lat_long
optional_parameters.description: dropoff location by latitude and longitude. Accepts a comma separated latitude and longitude values.

optional_parameters.name: result_limit
optional_parameters.description: Used with offset to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the number of properties to return with each call.

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_city_string
optional_parameters.description: Dropoff city name.

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_airport_code
optional_parameters.description: Accepts a 3-character IATA airport code.

optional_parameters.name: car_change_bundle
optional_parameters.description: Search using the car change bundle data. This bundle value is provided in the Change endpoint response when you request a booking change. With  this bundle data, you can search results for the changed search criteria.

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_counters
optional_parameters.description: Accepts an array of one or more keys as a 2-character car company code and the values as the counter ocation code.

optional_parameters.name: dropoff_city_id
optional_parameters.description: dropoff city ID. Or filters by dropoff_city_id when strict_city=1 is passed.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_counters
optional_parameters.description: Accepts an array of one or more keys as a 2-character car company code and the values as the counter location code.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Method of sorting the results. Valid options: PRICE_HIGH, PRICE_DESC, PARTNER_HIGH, and PARTNER_DESC.

optional_parameters.name: pickup_airport_code
optional_parameters.description: Accepts a 3-character IATA airport code.

api_list.name: Hotel reviews
api_list.description: This API returns a list of reviews

required_parameters.name: hotel_id
required_parameters.description: The PPN Hotel ID identifying the desired property.

optional_parameters.name: languages
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of results from the response.

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: CSV of sorting order metrics. Valid Options: creation_date, average_rating, or verified_guest followed by .asc or .desc.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Used with limit to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the nuber of properties to skip (starting at 0) before returning results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of results from the response.

optional_parameters.name: only_verified_guests
optional_parameters.description: Set on to only include only reviews with verified_guests. A verified guest is a guest that has had a review verified by aaa. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

optional_parameters.name: sid

optional_parameters.name: rate_identifier
optional_parameters.description: A toggle to show if rate identifier is being passed. Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true. Rate is a string that is set for each hotel and holds all the information regarding the rate that we send to priceline.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Pass the user s country to see rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.

optional_parameters.name: output_version
optional_parameters.description: Enum: 1 2 3 4

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language code: en-US, es-ES, fr-FR, pt-BR

optional_parameters.name: ppn_bundle
optional_parameters.description: ppn_bundle is a unique ID that ppn uses to identify a specific rate

api_list.name: Downalods hotels
api_list.description: Downalods a list of Hotels

optional_parameters.name: active_mer
optional_parameters.description: Show hotels with Priceline rates.

optional_parameters.name: latitude_range_end
optional_parameters.description: Requires latitude to have value.

optional_parameters.name: active_smop
optional_parameters.description: Show hotels with semi opaque rates.

optional_parameters.name: active_vmer
optional_parameters.description: Show hotels with vacation merchant rates.

optional_parameters.name: state_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter by the state code of the hotel.

optional_parameters.name: longitude_range_end
optional_parameters.description: Requires longitude to have value.

optional_parameters.name: active_bkg
optional_parameters.description: Show hotels with Booking rates.

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: Filter by latitude of the hotel.

optional_parameters.name: hotelid_ppn
optional_parameters.description: Filter by PPN hotel ID.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: Requires longitude to have value.

optional_parameters.name: property_type_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by property type ids. See the Property Type Filter Guide for more detail.

optional_parameters.name: cityid_ppn
optional_parameters.description: Filter by PPN city ID.

optional_parameters.name: hotel_address
optional_parameters.description: Filter by address of hotel.

optional_parameters.name: resume_key
optional_parameters.description: Resume results from given ID.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language code: en-US, es-ES, fr-FR, pt-BR

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of results from the response.

optional_parameters.name: active_agd
optional_parameters.description: Show hotels with Agoda rates.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter by the country code of the hotel.

optional_parameters.name: changes_since
optional_parameters.description: Date/time to filter the hotels that have been updated on or after this date. This will discover the last_changed_date of hotels in inventory (inclusive of the selected date). Date should be in a valid ISO 8601: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601 (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss{UTC_Offset}) format.
